mapper.select:
select ri.id, ri.user_id, ri.content, ri.create_date, ri.medical_id, mi.title, mi.publisher, ui.name, ui.images from reply_info ri left join medical_info mi on (mi.id = ri.medical_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = ri.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND mi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.title},'%')
AND ui.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{replyInfo.name},'%')
order by ri.create_date desc
